nodes.bodyText: Directly use SUM() in the query instead of using java to sum.
In all java controller, every process must be inside a : try { // Something } catch(Exception e) { TraceBackService.trace(response, e); }.
divide must always have a roundingmode argument and a scale to avoid throwing exception if the exact quotient cannot be represented
